definition: blank (e.g. for a coin)/unburnt earthenware/semifinished product/Taiwan pr. [pei1]
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
base/semifinished product/(fig.) the makings of (a talented actor etc)
blank (for a coin etc)/breed or strain
to make ceramics (on a potter's wheel)

sentences.english: Oxy-hydrogen flame can replace other flames for cutting billet.
sentences.chinese: 完全可以代替其它燃气用于连铸坯切割。

sentences.english: Parison formation is a critical stage in plastics extrusion blow molding.
sentences.chinese: 型坯成型是塑料挤出吹塑中的一个重要阶段。

sentences.english: The methods of improving cast-rolling strip are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 提出了改善铸轧带坯质量的措施。

sentences.english: This product is manufactured by powder metallurgy through compacting and pressure working.
sentences.chinese: 本产品系采用粉末冶金方法经压坯和压力加工而制成。

sentences.english: Parison wall thickness programmer is one of the key elements in blow moulding machines.
sentences.chinese: 型坯壁厚控制器是塑料中空成型机的关键部件之一。

sentences.english: The article has introduced the cross wedge rolling preforming technology and its die design.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了楔横轧制坯工艺及其模具设计。

sentences.english: Supplies of the 'blanks' needed to produce coins are running short, the Mint said.
sentences.chinese: 造币局说，造币用的金属坯供应不足。

sentences.english: The preparation and treatments of the tips blank and structure design of the cold upsetting die were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了漏嘴坯制备处理及冷镦模具结构设计。

sentences.english: An experimental study of glaze-fit of some commercial fine earthenwares is described.
sentences.chinese: 本试验对几种精陶器的坯釉结合性能作了研究。

sentences.english: No quality round bloom, no quality seamless steel tube.
sentences.chinese: 优质的圆管坯是生产高质量无缝钢管的前提。

sentences.english: Most preform moulds are rectangular and are longer than they are wide.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的瓶坯模具呈长形，就是长度比阔度大。

sentences.english: The influence of base powder on thermal stability of inner wall tile was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了坯粉性能对内墙砖热稳定性的影响。

sentences.english: Vacuum sintering and sintering in hydrogen atmosphere of warm-compacted green compacts has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了铁粉温压压坯在真空和氢气中的烧结行为。

sentences.english: Condensate will leave marks on the preform surface.
sentences.chinese: 露水会遗留痕迹在瓶坯的表面上。

sentences.english: A calculating formula of the relationship between beam gap and parison wall thickness is presented.
sentences.chinese: 重新推导出该间隔与型坯壁厚之间的计算公式。

sentences.english: Curving transfer-bars with three rollers in hot coil box is a key function of the hot coil box.
sentences.chinese: 中间坯的三辊滚弯的控制是热卷箱的关键功能控制。

definition: blank (for a coin etc)/breed or strain
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
